Name: mal-abdulhameedmada-lad
Author: Abdul Hameed Madani And Kunhi Mohammed

Translations.Text: tanṟe cuṟṟumuḷḷa pramukhanmārēāṭ avan (phir'aun) paṟaññu: tīrccayāyuṁ ivan vivaramuḷḷa oru jālavidyakkāran tanneyāṇ‌
tanṟe jālavidyakeāṇṭ niṅṅaḷuṭe nāṭṭilninn niṅṅaḷe puṟattākkān avan uddēśikkunnu atināl ‍niṅṅaḷ ent nirdēśikkunnu
avar paṟaññu: avannuṁ avanṟe sahēādarannuṁ tāṅkaḷ sāvakāśaṁ nalkuka āḷukaḷe viḷiccukūṭṭān nagaraṅṅaḷilēkk tāṅkaḷ dūtanmāre niyēāgikkukayuṁ ceyyuka
ellā vivaramuḷḷa jālavidyakkāreyuṁ avar tāṅkaḷuṭe aṭutt keāṇṭu varaṭṭe
aṅṅane aṟiyappeṭṭa oru divasaṁ niścitamāya oru samayatt jālavidyakkār orumiccukūṭṭappeṭṭu
aṅṅane jālavidyakkār vannettiyappēāḷ phir'aunēāṭ avar cēādiccu: ñaṅṅaḷāṇ vijayikaḷākunnateṅkil ‍tīrccayāyuṁ ñaṅṅaḷkk pratiphalamuṇṭāyirikkumēā
avan (phir'aun) paṟaññu: ate, tīrccayāyuṁ niṅṅaḷ sāmīpyaṁ nalkappeṭunnavaruṭe kūṭṭattilāyirikkuṁ
mūsā avarēāṭ paṟaññu: niṅṅaḷkk iṭānuḷḷatellāṁ niṅṅaḷ iṭṭukeāḷḷuka
appēāḷ taṅṅaḷuṭe kayaṟukaḷuṁ vaṭikaḷuṁ avar iṭṭu avar paṟayukayuṁ ceytu: phir'aunṟe pratāpaṁ tanneyāṇa satyaṁ! tīrccayāyuṁ ñaṅṅaḷ tanneyāyirikkuṁ vijayikaḷ
anantaraṁ mūsā tanṟe vaṭi tāḻeyiṭṭu appēāḻatā at avar vyājamāyi nirmiccirunnatineyellāṁ viḻuṅṅikkaḷayunnu

avan (phir'aun) paṟaññu: ñān niṅṅaḷkk anuvādaṁ tarunnatin mumpāyi niṅṅaḷ avanil ‍viśvasiccuvennēā? tīrccayāyuṁ ivan niṅṅaḷkk jālavidya paṭhippicca niṅṅaḷuṭe talavan tanneyāṇ vaḻiye niṅṅaḷ aṟiññu keāḷḷuṁ tīrccayāyuṁ niṅṅaḷuṭe kaikaḷuṁ, niṅṅaḷuṭe kālukaḷuṁ etir ‍vaśaṅṅaḷilninnāyikkeāṇṭ ñān muṟiccu kaḷayukayuṁ, niṅṅaḷe muḻuvan ñān krūśikkukayuṁ ceyyunnatāṇ‌
avar paṟaññu: kuḻappamilla tīrccayāyuṁ ñaṅṅaḷ ñaṅṅaḷuṭe rakṣitāviṅkalēkk maṭaṅṅippēākunnavarākunnu
ñaṅṅaḷ ādyamāyi viśvasiccavarāyatināl ‍ñaṅṅaḷuṭe teṟṟukaḷ ñaṅṅaḷuṭe rakṣitāv ñaṅṅaḷkk peāṟuttutarumenn ñaṅṅaḷ āśikkunnu
mūsāykk nāṁ bēādhanaṁ nalki: enṟe dāsanmāreyuṁ keāṇṭ rātriyil ‍nī puṟappeṭṭukeāḷḷuka tīrccayāyuṁ (śatrukkaḷ) niṅṅaḷe pintuṭarān pēākukayāṇ‌
